abstract: Serving in Libya in World War II, Jack was captured and became a POW.
description: Serving in Libya , Jack was captured and became a POW. Almost dying from injures , he would spend over 3 months in prisoner camps in Europe. Today he still remember his mates who didn't make it and the doctor who who saved his life.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002738; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans; Active; 2011
